title: Journalists finally break Big Tech’s free-speech spell
description: I was recently having a conversation with Natalia Antelava, founder of the newsroom Coda, about social media regulation. I was telling her my wariness about it: as a journalist, I don’t want the government making rules about which speech is or isn’t harmful. I know social media platforms are powerful, and do cause lots of...
